This deviant's activity is hidden.
Deviant since Nov 7, 2003 | Give Premium Membership Welcome to the Universe Art Zone Personal Zone Misc. Zone This is the place where you can personalize your profile! But, how? By moving, adding and personalizing widgets. You can drag and drop to rearrange. You can edit widgets to customize them. The bottom has widgets you can add! Some widgets you can only access when you get a premium membership. Some widgets have options that are only available when you get a premium membership.
We've split the page into zones! Certain widgets can only be added to certain zones. "Why," you ask? Because we want profile pages to have freedom of customization, but also to have some consistency. This way, when anyone visits a deviant, they know they can always find the art in the top left, and personal info in the top right. Don't forget, restraints can bring out the creativity in you!
Now go forth and astound us all with your devious profiles! OK

~ finalfantasy-lover ~ electriclovers ~ meganjonas * animetist ~ Nilaky ~ blackacid23 ~ paranoidonion ~ bowlcutavenger ~ nuriwan ~ w-e-love-wall-e ~ kindreanselkie ~ 12of8 ~ HEMACHI ! lil-mikoto ~ Oatmealmonkey ~ Laegreffon ~ pixelato ~ OrcaLady249 * HyperCaz ~ Gatemage All Watchers Time's almost up
Aug 5, 2009, 3:28:29 AM by ~ Saji-Chan Journals / Personal I'm referring to summer, the deadline to my essay and my move-in date. Did I mention that I get a bathtub in my new CA room? It's pretty epic. I think Palo Verde West/East are the only dorms where the Community Assistant have a bathtub in their bathroom.
1. What time did you get up this morning? 3:07pm. Thank you Erin
2. How do you like your steak? Medium well to well done.
3. What was the last film you saw at the cinema? Public Enemies
4. What is your favorite TV show? Daily Show and Hell's Kitchen.
5. If you could live anywhere in the world where would it be? London
6. What did you have for breakfast? Bagel with cream cheese.
7. What is your favorite cuisine? Seafood
8. What foods do you dislike? I'm not a fan of fish, onions or ham.
9. Favorite Place to Eat? Chili's
10. Favorite dressing? Caesar or Italian
11.What kind of vehicle do you drive? My IMAGINATION! (aka, I don't have a car and I can't drive)
12. What are your favorite clothes? Jeans and T-shirts.
13. Where would you visit if you had the chance? Japan, Eastern US and the United Kingdom
14. Cup 1/2 empty or 1/2 full? Empty
15. Where would you want to retire? Home?
16. Favorite time of day? late night
17. Where were you born? Oklahoma
18. What is your favorite sport to watch? Swimming, diving, and ice skating.
19. Who do you think will not tag you back? I don't care
20. Person you expect to tag you back first? a good willed honest and magnificent person
21. Who are you most curious about their responses to this? them all. It is fun
22. Bird watcher? No
23. Are you a morning person or a night person? I can be both but right now I'm nocturnal.
24. Do you have any pets? Two fish in two states.
25. Any new and exciting news you'd like to share? I have a bathtub. This is exciting cause I haven't had a proper bath in four years.
26. What did you want to be when you were little? A vet, I think.
27. What is your best childhood memory? Climbing trees in dresses and nailing my mom in the back with a snowball.
28. Are you a cat or dog person? CAT
29. Are you married? Yes, to the internet.
30. Always wear your seat belt? Yes. 31. Been in a car accident? One back in June.
32. Any pet peeves? Being an ass and thinking that you are better than everyone else around you.
33. Favorite Pizza Toppings? Sausage and olives.
34. Favorite Flower? Rose or violets.
35. Favorite ice cream? Coconut.
36. Favorite fast food restaurant? Panda Express or Subway.
37. How many times did you fail your driver's test? 0 since I've never taken it.
38. From whom did you get your last email? USGS saying that there was an earthquake in the pacific.
39. Which store would you choose to max out your credit card? Video game store.
40. Do anything spontaneous lately? Crack
41. Like your job? Sure, let's go with that answer.
42. Broccoli? Yes. its good.
43. What was your favorite vacation? Last year's trip to LA.
44. Last person you went out to dinner with? Rachel, Jessica, Megan and Kelly.
45. What are you listening to right now? The Daily Show.
46. What is your favorite color? Blue, green, purple, red and black.
47. How many tattoos do you have? None but I did stab myself a few times with a graphite pencil and it looks like a tattoo
48. How many are you tagging for this quiz? None cause I'm nice.
49. What time did you finish this quiz? The future.
50. Coffee Drinker? More of a tea drinker at the moment but that might change when school starts. No Comments Mood: Winter Downs Listening to: My teeth rattle cause it's so cold in San Pablo Eating: Mints Drinking: Water Time's almost up August 5, 2009 No Comments No Favourites More Journal Entries deviantID ~ Saji-Chan Welcome to the Universe United States Current Residence: No Fixed Address Favourite genre of music: Instrumental, classical, soundtracks, a bit of metal and alt. Favourite photographer: Hubble Space Telescope Favourite style of art: Fractal Operating System: Lepoard MP3 player of choice: iPod Touch Personal Quote: We begin from the end- Captain Jack Harkness Interests Favorite bands / musical artists Varies on mood Other Interests Things that have nothing to do with you AdCast - Ads from the Community [x] Webcam
